1178:308: dānādau ṣaḍvidhe teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ saṃgraheṇa yā |

1178:591: anāsravasya abhinirhārabhāvanāmārgasya lakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi -
1178:606: prathamāṃ bhūmimārabhya daśamīṃ bhūmiṃ yāvadasyābhinirhārasya sīmā bhavati |
1178:608: atyantaviśuddhyākhyasya anāsravabhāvanāmārgasya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre tisṛbhiḥ kārikābhiḥ suspaṣṭaṃ pratipāditam | tathā hi-

1178:633: 9. darśanamārgaśceti nava dharmāḥ sarvajñatopalakṣakā iti abhisamayālaṅkāre dvābhyāṃ kārikābhyāṃ samyaguktāḥ| tathā hi -
1178:634: prajñayā na bhave sthānaṃ kṛpayā na śame sthitiḥ |
1178:640: ubhayorlakṣaṇādikam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā pratipāditam | tathā hi-

1178:646: anityādiṣoḍaśākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāriṇī hīnayānajātīyā mahākaruṇāgarbhā māhāyānikaryasantatisthā prajñā asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā lakṣaṇam |

1178:667: asya lakṣaṇādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena spaṣṭamullikhitam tathā hi -
1178:670: śrāvakādīnām adhvasamatājñānābhāvāt anityādyākārāṇāṃ sākṣātkāri jñānaṃ sanimittopalambhayogena kṛpāprajñāvaikalyāt dūrībhūtaṃ jinajananyā iti lakṣaṇam |
1178:676: asya lakṣaṇādīnāṃ pratipādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena samyak kṛtam| tathā hi -

1178:1388: yo'dhigamaḥ sa ānupūrvikābhisamayastrayodaśavidha ityasya trayodaśa bhedā bhavanti |
1178:1393: ekakṣaṇābhisambodhasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikārdhena saṃkṣepataḥ kṛtaḥ | tathā hi-
1178:1397: adhigatatrisarvajñatākāreṣu svabhyastasteṣāmeva kṣaṇenaikenādhigamarūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha iti lakṣaṇam |
1178:1408: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā parīdīpitam | tathā hi-
1178:1412: ekakṣaṇadānādijñānena anāsravadānādyaśītyanuvyañjanalakṣaṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃgraheṇa bodhisattvasya avabodharūpaḥ paryantayogaḥ avipākānāsravasarvadharmaikakṣaṇalakṣaṇo bhavatīti lakṣaṇam |
1178:1414: asya sarvaṃ svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā samyagabhihitam | tathā hi-
1178:1418: yadā bodhisattvasya pratipakṣabhāvanayā sarvavipakṣakalaṅkāpagamena sakalavyavadānapakṣavipākadharmatāvasthā śuklasvabhāvā jātā,
1178:1419: tadā ekasminneva kṣaṇe vipākāvasthāprāptānām anāsravadharmāṇāṃ bodhāt jñānaṃ (prajñāpāramitā)
1178:1424: asya svarūpādikaṃ sarvam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā suspaṣṭamupavarṇitam | tathā hi -
1178:1428: pūrvaṃ svapnopamasarvadharmābhyāsena sambhāradvayamanubhūya adhigamāvasthāyāṃ svapnasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu upādānaskandhādiṣu sthitvā dānādiṣaṭpāramitāpratipattyā dānādirūpanirūpaṇākāreṇa alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā iti saṃkleśavyavadānarūpāṇāṃ sarvadharmāṇāmekenaiva kṣaṇena alakṣaṇatvaṃ jānāti,
1178:1431: asyādvayalakṣaṇasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā spaṣṭamupadarśitam | tathā hi-
1178:1435: nirantaradīrghakāladvayapratibhāsaprahāṇābhyāsasātmībhāvād unmīlitadvayapratibhāsavāsano yadā bodhisattvo grāhyagrāhakayogena svapnaṃ grāhyaṃ svapnadarśinaṃ grāhakaṃ nekṣate,
1178:1436: tadā sarve'pyevaṃdharmāṇo dharmā iti dharmāṇāmadvayaṃ tattvamekenaiva kṣaṇena paśyati,
1178:1443: aya ityadhigama ityevaṃ antimakāle dānādisarvānāsravadharmāṇāmaviparītaḥ samyak prativedhaḥ ekakṣaṇābhisambodha ityucyate |
1178:1448: vipākabhūtasya dharmakāyasya saṃkṣiptanirdeśaḥ abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā paridīpitaḥ | tathā hi-
1178:1454: sambhāradvayasaṃcayabalena prāptāḥ paryantaguṇā eva phalabhūto dharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
1178:1462: asya svābhāvikakāyasyopapādanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam | tathā hi-
1178:1463: sarvākārāṃ viśuddhiṃ ye dharmāḥ prāptā nirāsravāḥ |
1178:1472: asya jñānakāyasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre pañcabhiḥ kārikābhirupadarśitam |
1178:1474: yāvajjñānaṃ yathāvajjñānaṃ cāpekṣya sākṣātkāri paryantajñāna jñānadharmakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
1178:1477: buddhabhūmau anāsravajñānānāmekaviṃśatiḥ jñānavargā evāsya ekaviṃśatiḥ prabhedāḥ | tathā hi-
1178:1513: sambhogakāyasya svarūpavarṇanam abhisamayālaṅkāre ekayā kārikayā kṛtam | tathā hi -
1178:1517: sthāna- kāya- parivāra- dharma- kālākhyaiḥ pañcabhirviniyatairvirśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ sambhogakāya iti lakṣaṇam |
1178:1523: ayaṃ sambhogakāyo buddhabhūmau akaniṣṭhaghanavyūhakṣetre eva kevalaṃ bhavati |
1178:1525: kāyasyāsya nairmāṇikasya svarūpam abhisamayālaṅkāre kārikayā ekayā samyagupavarṇitam | tathā hi-
1178:1526: karoti yena citrāṇi hitāni jagataḥ samam |
1178:1527: ā bhavāt so'nupacchinnaḥ kāyo nairmāṇiko muneḥ ||
1178:1530: yena śākyamunitathāgatādirūpeṇa āsaṃsāraṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ samīhitamarthaṃ samaṃ karoti,
1178:1531: asau kāyaḥ prabandhatayā anuparato nairmāṇiko buddhasya bhagavataḥ sarvabālajanasādhāraṇaścaturtho'vasātavyaḥ |
1178:1538: imāni bhagavato vicitrāṇi kāritrāṇi abhisamayālaṅkāre saptabhiḥ kārikābhirvistaraśo nirdiṣṭāni |
1178:1542: gatipraśamanakāritrata ārabhya nirvāṇaniveśanaparyantaṃ saptaviṃśatiḥ karmāṇyevāsya saptaviṃśatiḥ prabhedā bhavanti |
1178:1545: gatīnāṃ śamanaṃ karmaṃ saṃġrahe ca caturvidhe ||
1178:1566: vineyajanapratibhāsabhāk saptaviṃśatiprakāraṃ karma avicchinnatayā āsaṃsāraṃ pravartate |
1178:1570: aṣṭapadārthopalakṣakāṇāṃ ca saptateḥ padārthānāṃ prakāśakamidaṃ subhāṣitaṃ jagadguroḥ maitreyanāthasya mukhānniḥ - sṛtasyāgamasya caturdikṣuḥ prasārāya lokasya ca sanmārgārohaṇāya prabhavediti pariṇāmanā |
